entry.summary: Learn how to choose the best services for building an end-to-end machine learning pipeline from experimentation to deployment.

entry.summary: A detailed explanation of the MLOps maturity model stages which lists defining characteristics of each stage.

entry.title: Send Databricks app logs to Azure Monitor
entry.summary: Learn how to send application logs and metrics from Azure Databricks to a Log Analytics workspace using the Azure Databricks Monitoring Library.

entry.title: Dashboards to visualize Azure Databricks metrics
entry.summary: Learn how to set up a Grafana dashboard to monitor performance of Azure Databricks jobs. Azure Databricks is an Apache Spark-based analytics service.

entry.title: Monitor Azure Databricks
entry.summary: Learn how to extend the core monitoring functionality of Azure Databricks to send Apache Spark metrics, events, and logging information to Azure Monitor.

entry.title: Troubleshoot Databricks performance issues
entry.summary: Use Grafana monitoring dashboards to troubleshoot performance bottlenecks in Apache Spark jobs on Azure Databricks.

entry.title: Computer forensics chain of custody in Azure
entry.summary: Create an infrastructure and workflow to ensure a valid digital evidence chain of custody (CoC) for computer forensics in Azure.

entry.title: Apache NiFi on Azure
entry.summary: Automate data flows with Apache NiFi on Azure. Use a scalable, highly available solution to move data into the cloud or storage and between cloud systems.

entry.title: Data governance with Profisee and Microsoft Purview
entry.summary: Integrate Profisee master data management with Microsoft Purview, to build a foundation for data governance and management. Produce and deliver high-quality, trusted data.

entry.title: Azure Cosmos DB considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Cosmos DB that are useful when working with multitenanted systems, and links to guidance and examples for how to use Azure Cosmos DB in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Enterprise integration with message broker and events
entry.summary: This example architecture integrates enterprise backend systems, using message broker and events to decouple services for greater scalability and reliability.

entry.title: Eventual consistency between multiple Power Apps instances
entry.summary: Handle dependent data in a resilient way in Power Apps.

entry.title: Build real-time monitoring and observable systems for media
entry.summary: Learn how to implement real-time monitoring and observability of systems and end-user device telemetry data.

entry.title: Mission-critical baseline architecture in an Azure landing zone
entry.summary: Reference architecture for a mission-critical workload that takes a dependency on Azure landing zones for connectivity resources, which allows integration with other applications and shared services of an enterprise.

entry.title: Use Private Link to access applications on networks with overlapping address spaces
entry.summary: Learn how to use Private Link to expose apps running in one virtual network to consumers in another virtual network that has an overlapping IP address space.

entry.title: Measure Azure app sustainability by using the SCI score
entry.summary: Create a sustainability model based on available proxies that scores the carbon impact of an application.

entry.title: High-performance computing (HPC) deployments
entry.summary: Review a list of applications and solutions related to HPC deployments.

entry.title: Create an Azure private 5G split core shop floor network
entry.summary: Discover how a split 5G/LTE core architecture is suited for large enterprises that have multiple sites.

entry.title: Location-based access control for FSI applications
entry.summary: Use Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) named locations application context to control access to financial services industry (FSI) data and applications.

entry.title: Migrate mainframe data tier to Azure with mLogica LIBER*IRIS
entry.summary: Find out how mLogica LIBER*IRIS provides a proven solution for bulk data migration from a mainframe to Azure for enterprise workloads.

entry.title: Azure Service Bus considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Service Bus that are useful when you use it in multitenanted systems. It provides links to guidance for how to use Azure Service Bus in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: IoT solution to Azure IoT migration best practices
entry.summary: Review recommendations and best practices to plan your IoT migration to Azure IoT, such as analyzing your current solution and creating a migration strategy.

entry.title: Migrate your IoT solutions to Azure
entry.summary: Find out about migrating your IoT solutions to Azure, including devices, gateways, ingestion, communications, event processing, and analytics.

entry.title: Configuration-driven data pipeline
entry.summary: Learn how business users and the operations team can create and maintain data pipelines by using configuration files that define the pipelines.

entry.summary: Learn about running SAS Grid 9.4 on Azure, using Azure NetApp Files for SASDATA storage, and about storage options for SASWORK.

entry.summary: Find out how WRF performs on an Azure VM and get a brief description of the steps for running the software on Azure.

entry.summary: The network secure ingress pattern implementation illustrates global routing, low latency failover for unhealthy workloads, and mitigating attacks at the edge.

entry.summary: See how a logical data warehouse uses Azure Synapse serverless SQL pools to query data lake and online transactional data without requiring data movement.

entry.summary: Find out how to automate video analysis. Use Computer Vision and Azure Machine Learning to analyze your content.

entry.summary: Get an overview of how system integrators and operators can build private networks for enterprises by using Azure services.

entry.summary: Use Azure Traffic Manager to automatically add resources to an existing app to accommodate an increase in load.

entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Traffic Manager to direct traffic to specific cloud and on-premises endpoints based on various metrics.

entry.summary: Deploy an AKS cluster in a hub-and-spoke network topology by using Terraform and Azure DevOps. Help protect inbound and outbound traffic by using Azure Firewall.

entry.summary: Learn how Azure services and components can provide scale-out performance comparable to IBM z/OS mainframe CF and Parallel Sysplex capabilities.

entry.summary: Use the Microsoft Simple Encrypted Arithmetic Library (SEAL) to implement homomorphic encryption so that you can run computations directly on encrypted data.
